name: Tanks (itch) (ItsDish)
description:
These are a collection of a 3 different tank games.

The first one being a single player tank game where you can move around an enclosed arena as a tank and shoot enemies.

The second one is a local multiplayer version built upon the first game, to allow for two players to play against each other simultaneously.


The final one is a tank faction auto battler, where you can select how many factions of tanks there are and how many tanks will be in each faction and simulate the results of which faction would win.

Controls Single Player:

  • Move up - Up arrow key
  • Move down - Down arrow key
  • Move left - Left arrow key
  • Move right - right arrow key
  • Shoot ammo - Spacebar

Controls Multiplayer Player:

  • Move up - Up arrow key, W
  • Move down - Down arrow key, S
  • Move left - Left arrow key, A
  • Move right - right arrow key, D
  • Shoot ammo - Spacebar, >
